description: Students apply psychological facts and principles to the problems that permeate business and industry. Topics include organizational structure, personnel management, employee-supervisor relationships, job satisfaction and motivation, communication and leadership. Prerequisite: Psychology 125, Statistics 110, 212 or 263. Offered Spring Semester only.
name: Indust/Organizations
prerequisites: Psychology 125, Statistics 110, 212 or 263. Offered Spring Semester only.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Psychology 125, Statistics 110, 212 or 263. Offered Spring Semester only.

title: Industrial/Organizational Psychology
